backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all core data types (Product, Order, Cart, Review, Notification, etc.) and state maps for the Mosslight Studios e-commerce backend, mixing in storage and authorization modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the SKU input field feature was implemented in ProductForm.tsx with high confidence, referencing test ID REQ-1.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing the purpose and recent changes of components, pages, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, primary, sidebar, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Mosslight Studios Vite/React app, mounting the React root div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes (storefront, admin, forum, etc.) and wraps the app with ThemeProvider, AdminAuthProvider, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Full-page access denied UI component showing a shield alert icon and a button to navigate back to the home page for unauthorized users.
Cart button component that handles quantity input, variant selection validation, inventory checks, and calls the addItemToCart mutation with appropriate error toasts.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard component that renders children only when the admin is authenticated, otherwise displaying the AccessDeniedScreen.
Modal dialog component for admin authentication that accepts an 8-digit passcode, calls the login hook, and navigates to the admin dashboard on success.
frontend/src/components/AdminNotificatio: Displays unread admin and low-inventory notifications in a card panel, with a button to mark each notification as read.
frontend/src/components/AdminReplyForm.t: Form component visible only to admin users that allows posting a reply to a specific discussion board post.
Form for authenticated users to submit a new question to the discussion board, with loading and auth-state feedback.
frontend/src/components/CustomerMessages: Renders a list of messages sent to a customer from Mosslight Studios, labeling broadcast messages with an 'Announcement' badge.
frontend/src/components/DiscussionPostLi: Displays a sorted list of discussion posts as clickable cards showing the question, status badge, timestamp, and reply count.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer showing social media links, copyright year, and a 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link.
frontend/src/components/GalleryItem.tsx: Renders a single gallery card with an optional media image, content text, and records a content-view analytics event on mount.
frontend/src/components/GalleryUploadFor: Admin form for uploading gallery content with optional media files, showing upload progress and submitting via the addSocialMediaContent hook.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main site header with navigation links, cart icon with item count, notification bell, admin access modal, and Internet Identity login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps all pages with a sticky Header, a main content Outlet, and a Footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Standalone button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing a loading spinner during authentication.
Admin form card for composing and sending broadcast messages to all customers, with recipient type selection and submission state handling.
frontend/src/components/MessageHistory.t: Displays a list of previously sent messages as cards, showing timestamp, broadcast/direct badge, content, and optional recipient info.
frontend/src/components/MyOrderCard.tsx: Displays a single customer order card with item details, variant info, per-line totals, order date, and status badge.
frontend/src/components/NotificationBell: Dropdown notification bell icon that shows unread notifications with type-specific icons and relative timestamps, and marks them as read on click.
frontend/src/components/OrderList.tsx: Admin order list with search filtering by order ID or customer, and an inline status update dropdown for each order.
frontend/src/components/OrderStatusBadge: Small badge component that maps an OrderStatus value to a styled label (Pending, Shipped, Delivered).
Small badge component that maps a PostStatus value to a color-styled label (Open or Answered).
frontend/src/components/PrincipalDisplay: Displays the authenticated user's Internet Identity principal in a banner with a copy-to-clipboard button and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Renders a product card with image, name, price, stock badge, and star ratings, linking to the product detail page and recording analytics on click.
frontend/src/components/ProductFilterSid: Sidebar component that derives available filter options (categories, price ranges, colors, sizes) from the product list and manages active filter state with collapsible sections and active-filter badges.
frontend/src/components/ProductForm.tsx: Admin form for creating or editing a product, supporting fields for name, SKU, description, price, inventory, images, variants, and tag inputs for categories/colors/sizes.
frontend/src/components/ProductReviews.t: Displays a list of product reviews with star ratings, verified-purchase badges, and timestamps, along with an aggregate average rating summary.
frontend/src/components/ProductSearch.ts: Provides a search bar and price-range dropdown that filter a product list in real time and notify the parent via a callback.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that collects a new user's name, email, and shipping address on first login and saves the profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ReplyList.tsx: Renders a sorted list of reply cards, each displaying an admin badge and formatted timestamp alongside the reply content.
frontend/src/components/ReviewForm.tsx: A form component for authenticated users to submit a star rating and text review for a product, with validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/SocialMediaLinks: Displays icon links to Moss Light Studios' Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok social media profiles.
frontend/src/components/VariantManager.t: Admin UI component for adding, editing, and removing product variants (size, color, price, inventory) with inline validation and a table display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.tsx: React context and hook providing admin authentication via a hardcoded principal or passcode, with session persistence in localStorage and backend access-control initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnalytics.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch aggregated analytics data (clicks, views, revenue, orders, low inventory) and to record analytics events.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Exposes React Query hooks for viewing, adding items to, clearing, and checking out the user's shopping cart via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerMessages.t: Hook that fetches the authenticated user's messages from the backend using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerOrders.ts: Provides hooks to fetch all of the current user's orders or a single order by ID from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useDiscussionBoard.ts: Hooks for fetching all discussion posts, a single thread, creating a new post, and adding a reply, all backed by React Query mutations and queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useGallery.ts: Provides hooks to fetch social media content from the backend and a stub mutation for uploading new content (not yet implemented).
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state and persisting identity across page reloads using DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching messages and sending a message to a recipient via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching unread notifications and marking a notification as read via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching orders and updating an order's status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and deleting products, with permission and authentication error handling for admin-only mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductVariants.ts: Exports a React Query hook for fetching product variants for a given product ID from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useReviews.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching product reviews with average rating and submitting a new review via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile and retrieving their user role from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS and defines Mosslight Studios brand CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, plus typography settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page displaying Mosslight Studios' story, mission, and contact/social media links.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAnalyticsPage.ts: Admin page displaying analytics metrics including total revenue, order count, product clicks, content views, and low inventory alerts, protected by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard landing page showing navigation cards for all admin sections (products, orders, messages, gallery, forum, analytics) along with a notifications panel.
frontend/src/pages/AdminGalleryPage.tsx: Admin page for uploading and managing gallery/social media content, rendering the GalleryUploadForm component inside an AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMessagesPage.tsx: Admin page with tabbed interface for composing new customer messages and viewing message history, protected by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrdersPage.tsx: Admin page that fetches and displays all customer orders via the OrderList component, with a loading spinner while data is fetched.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Admin page for managing the product catalog with the ability to add, edit, and delete products, toggling between a product grid view and a ProductForm.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page that displays cart items with product details, calculates totals, and provides options to clear the cart or proceed to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page that displays pre-filled shipping info from the user profile and a demo payment form, placing an order on submission and redirecting to an order success page.
frontend/src/pages/FAQPage.tsx: Renders a static FAQ page organized into four categories (Shipping, Returns, Product Care, Ordering) using an accordion component for collapsible Q&A items.
frontend/src/pages/ForumPage.tsx: Displays a discussion board page with a question submission form and a list of recent community questions fetched via the useDiscussionPosts hook.
frontend/src/pages/ForumThreadPage.tsx: Shows a single forum thread detail page with the original question, its replies, and an admin reply form, fetched by postId from the route params.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a gallery page displaying social media content items in a responsive grid alongside social media follow links, fetched via useGetSocialMediaContent.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page featuring a hero section with background image, a three-feature highlights section, and a call-to-action section linking to the products and gallery pages.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Authenticated account page showing the user's orders and messages in tabs, with a profile setup modal for new users and an access denied screen for unauthenticated visitors.
frontend/src/pages/OrderSuccessPage.tsx: Confirmation page displayed after a successful order, showing the order ID from search params and navigation buttons to view orders or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Product detail page that fetches a product and its variants, supports size/color selection, displays pricing and stock status, and includes add-to-cart, reviews, and review form components.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Renders the public products listing page with combined text search and sidebar attribute filtering (category, price, color, size) applied in sequence over fetched products.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL query parameters (including hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom design tokens (colors, fonts, shadows, border radii, animations) and enabling the typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, architectural notes, known issues, existing features, and pending feature requests (SKU field addition and admin permission fix) for the Mosslight Studios e-commerce app.
